医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
高强度运动可提高绝经后女性的骨密度而不损害膝盖健康研究表明，六个月的高强度单侧运动可显着改善绝经后女性的股骨颈骨密度，而不会对膝骨关节炎的进展产生负面影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/High-impact-exercise-boosts-bone-密度-without-harming-knee-health-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/High-impact-exercise-boosts-bone-密度-without-harming-knee-health-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f40c0555-b3c6-48ed-a897-3017f1b0244c Tue, 02 Jul 2024 23:49:00 -0400 High-impact exercise boosts bone density without harming knee health in postmenopausal women
RNA剪接调节作为神经内分泌癌症治疗的精确方法神经内分泌肿瘤，包括小细胞肺癌和神经内分泌前列腺癌，具有很强的侵袭性，扩散的可能性很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/RNA-splicing-modulation-as-a- precision-approach-for-neuroendocrine-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/RNA-splicing-modulation-as-a- precision-approach-for-neuroendocrine-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59c79b28-d18e-4488-b30e-4074e538c1cb Tue, 02 Jul 2024 23:42:00 -0400 RNA splicing modulation as a precision approach for neuroendocrine cancer treatment
低剂量阿司匹林有望治疗怀孕期间与流感相关的血管炎症一项世界首例研究发现，低剂量阿司匹林可以治疗流感引起的血管炎症，从而在怀孕期间改善胎盘的血液流动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Low-dose-aspirin-shows-promise-in-treating-flu-lated-angio-inflammation-during-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Low-dose-aspirin-shows-promise-in-treating-flu-lated-angio-inflammation-during-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42bc9152-4d4c-43bd-a348-97f0d90c13d9 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 23:33:36 -0400 Low-dose aspirin shows promise in treating flu-related vascular inflammation during pregnancy
人工智能发现隐藏在 DNA“垃圾”区域中的潜在癌症驱动因素加文研究所的研究人员利用人工智能发现了隐藏在所谓的 DNA“垃圾”区域中的潜在癌症驱动因素，为新的诊断和治疗方法开辟了可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/AI-uncovers-pottial-cancer-drivers-hidden-in-junk-regions-of-DNA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/AI-uncovers-potential-cancer-drivers-hidden-in-junk-regions-of-DNA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0cd92b56-1311-488a-a9f6-4c3c8bdd5c13 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 23:28:49 -0400 AI uncovers potential cancer drivers hidden in 'junk' regions of DNA
新颖的数学方法揭示了抗肿瘤 CD8+ T 细胞中的共享基因程序我们着手鉴定 CD8+ T 细胞（可驱动多种人类癌症的抗肿瘤免疫的杀伤性免疫细胞）中常见表达的基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Novel-mathematical-approach-reveals-shared-gene-programs-in-anti-tumor-CD82b-T-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Novel-mathematical-approach-reveals-shared-gene-programs-in-anti-tumor-CD82b-T-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef1eacda-5343-40c1-8ac1-862decea152a Tue, 02 Jul 2024 23:22:49 -0400 Novel mathematical approach reveals shared gene programs in anti-tumor CD8+ T cells
研究揭示了非糖尿病肥胖个体中严重 COVID-19 背后的新机制早在 COVID-19 大流行之初，一组巴西研究人员就率先揭示了为什么 SARS-CoV-2 感染在糖尿病患者中往往更为严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Study-reveals-new-mechanisms-behind-severe-covid-19-in-obese-individuals-without-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Study-reveals-new-mechanisms-behind-severe-covid-19-in-obese-individuals-without-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c12e4e10-3706-44d6-b48c-12af680bb6d7 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 23:08:00 -0400 Study reveals new mechanisms behind severe COVID-19 in obese individuals without diabetes
可爱因素：婴儿图式可以解释我们进化的照顾本能吗？研究探讨了婴儿图式的进化意义，强调婴儿特征如何触发人类和其他动物的护理行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Cuteness-factor-Can-baby-schema-explain-our-evolutionary-caregiving-instincts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Cuteness-factor-Can-baby-schema-explain-our-evolutionary-caregiving-instincts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3da6d41b-f902-4e1a-b577-770f84b01e32 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 23:04:00 -0400 Cuteness factor: Can baby schema explain our evolutionary caregiving instincts?
核糖体和 ZAK 蛋白刺激细胞对紫外线辐射损伤的初始反应在最近的一项研究中，约翰霍普金斯大学医学院的研究人员提出，细胞的信使 RNA (mRNA) -；遗传物质的主要翻译者和调节者-；与一种名为 ZAK 的关键蛋白质一起，刺激细胞对紫外线辐射损伤的初始反应，并在细胞的生存或死亡中发挥关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Ribosomes-and-ZAK- Protein-spur-the-cells-initial-response-to-UV-radiation-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Ribosomes-and-ZAK- Protein-spur-the-cells-initial-response-to-UV-radiation-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fcb19fca-5507-45ad-b47b-f6c237eeff13 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 23:02:08 -0400 Ribosomes and ZAK protein spur the cell's initial response to UV radiation damage
创新的艾滋病毒疫苗方法具有广泛保护病毒株的潜力开发艾滋病毒疫苗的一个主要挑战是病毒突变速度非常快。尽管一个人最初感染了一种或几种艾滋病病毒毒株，但病毒会迅速复制和变异，导致一个人体内存在大量病毒毒株。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Innovative-HIV-vaccine-approaches-yield-pottial-for-broad-protection-against-viral-strains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Innovative-HIV-vaccine-approaches-yield-pottial-for-broad-protection-against-viral-strains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0566af4-26d0-432a-8e44-ff68cc68542d Tue, 02 Jul 2024 22:45:45 -0400 Innovative HIV vaccine approaches yield potential for broad protection against viral strains
SRI 的新型注射剂型旨在提供更好的抗击疟疾选择SRI 今天宣布，研究人员正在开发一种新的治疗方法，旨在为对抗疟疾提供更好的选择，特别是对于低收入和农村地区的人们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/SRIe28099s-novel-injectable-formulation-aims-to-provide-a-better-option-to-fight-malaria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/SRIe28099s-novel-injectable-formulation-aims-to-provide-a-better-option-to-fight-malaria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcf3b651-df06-490c-9300-1cd9b8f50097 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 22:33:45 -0400 SRI’s novel injectable formulation aims to provide a better option to fight malaria
